name: Machop
flavorText: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger. LV. 20 #66

strengths: Low Kick deals strong 20 damage for only 1 Fighting energy
Excellent damage-to-energy ratio makes it very energy efficient
Level 20 is high for a Basic Pokemon
Low retreat cost of 1 allows for mobility
Evolves into powerful Machoke and Machamp
weaknesses: Weak to Psychic-type attacks (x2 damage), making it vulnerable to Alakazam and Mewtwo
Only one attack limits strategic options
No resistance to reduce incoming damage
No special effects or status conditions to disrupt opponents
synergies: PlusPower boosts Low Kick to 30 damage, allowing it to knockout many Basic Pokemon
Defender helps Machop survive longer to deliver more attacks
Gust of Wind can bring out weak Pokemon for Machop to knockout
Professor Oak can help dig for evolution cards to reach Machoke/Machamp faster
Energy Removal can slow opponents while Machop applies pressure
counters: Psychic-type Pokemon like Alakazam and Mewtwo
High HP Pokemon that can tank Low Kick
